snippet: Grant Morrison, fresh off his own convention, is one of the big draws at this weekend’s sold-out New York Comic Con. But there’s a whole alternate universe of attractions beyond his appearance.
abstract: Comic book writer Grant Morrison is expected to be one of the big draws at this weekend’s sold-out New York Comic Con; other highlights of festival noted.
lead_paragraph: Grant Morrison, fresh off his own convention, is one of the big draws at this weekend’s sold-out New York Comic Con. But there’s a whole alternate universe of attractions beyond his appearance.

headline.seo: ‘Grant Morrison Spotlight’ at New York Comic Con
headline.main: A Human Superstar Among the Superheroes
headline.print_headline: A Human Superstar Among the Superheroes
